batchYeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.
batchYeasts.name: Safale American

mash.name: 11 High fermentability plus mash out (70 min)

yeasts.name: Safale American
yeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.

miscs.name: NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water
NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water

fermentables.name: Pale Ale Malt
fermentables.notes: BEST Pale Ale deepens the light “golden” color of top-fermented beers, creating a pleasant flavor. It forms an excellent enzyme-rich foundation for intensive colored beer styles. It is an excellent base malt for brewing many different styles of British Pale Ale as well as for brewing Kölsch beer.

fermentables.usedIn: Pilsener, Light eer, Lagerbier, Bock Beer, Alcohol reduced Beer
fermentables.name: Carapils
fermentables.notes: As used in Pilsner, “Lagerbier”, alcohol-reduced Beer, Light Beer and Bock Beer amongst others at a rate of up to 10 %. Use for foam improvement, improved head retention, fuller body. The lightest of the crystal malts.

recipe.notes:
Target: ABV = 4.4 %, IBU = 24.
Malt is ordered with standard crush @ The Malt Miller (https://www.themaltmiller.co.uk/).
recipe.name: Shameless Magpied Summer Ale
recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter

mashFermentables.name: Pale Ale Malt
mashFermentables.notes: BEST Pale Ale deepens the light “golden” color of top-fermented beers, creating a pleasant flavor. It forms an excellent enzyme-rich foundation for intensive colored beer styles. It is an excellent base malt for brewing many different styles of British Pale Ale as well as for brewing Kölsch beer.

mashFermentables.usedIn: Pilsener, Light eer, Lagerbier, Bock Beer, Alcohol reduced Beer
mashFermentables.name: Carapils
mashFermentables.notes: As used in Pilsner, “Lagerbier”, alcohol-reduced Beer, Light Beer and Bock Beer amongst others at a rate of up to 10 %. Use for foam improvement, improved head retention, fuller body. The lightest of the crystal malts.

notes.note: Added 6.14 grams Citra and 5.99 grams Centennial pellet hops to the FV.

BEST Pale Ale deepens the light “golden” color of top-fermented beers, creating a pleasant flavor. It forms an excellent enzyme-rich foundation for intensive colored beer styles. It is an excellent base malt for brewing many different styles of British Pale Ale as well as for brewing Kölsch beer.
